intro: Milo travels through Sugar Valley searching for magical ingredients to create the most amazing cake and save the joy of the kingdom.
description:
This is a visual novel in the narrative and reading genre.

Designed to provide educational values for children aged 7 to 12.

Milo, an adventurous little baker, travels through Sugar Valley searching for magical ingredients that teach him fun lessons in honesty, patience, rhythm, joy, and wisdom; along the way, he meets new friends and faces incredible challenges to create the perfect cake for his 99-year-old grandmother, featuring a secret ingredient: all the kindness he shared.
